author: AAA3A
Draper
jack1142 (Jackenmen#6607)
name: Sudo
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. If you like my work, please consider donating on my [Buy Me a Coffee page](<https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aaa3a>)! The commands `[p]su`, `[p]unsu`, `[p]sudo` and `[p]sutimeout` work directly.
⚠️ This cog makes bot owners unable to be perceived as bot owners in commands while the cog is loaded unless the `[p]su` command is used.
short: A cog to allow bot owners to be normal users in terms of permissions!
description: Have you ever wanted to allow bot owners to be normal users in terms of permissions? Then this cog is for you!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
